Package io.openlineage.client.metrics

package io.openlineage.client.metrics

  • Class
    Description
    CompositeMeterRegistryFactory
    A builder class that provides implementations to build composite meter registries.
    MeterRegistryFactory<T extends io.micrometer.core.instrument.MeterRegistry>
    MeterRegistryFactory is an interface that defines methods to build different types of meter registries from OpenLineage config.
    MicrometerProvider
    MicrometerProvider is a class that manages global OpenLineage meter registry implementation that allows integrations to both add metrics backend from common OpenLineage config, or grab an instance of an initialized MeterRegistry.
    SimpleMeterRegistryFactory
    This class implements the MetricsBuilder interface with SimpleMeterRegistry as its type.
    StatsDMeterRegistryFactory
    StatsDMetricsBuilder is a class that implements the MeterRegistryFactory interface specifically for StatsdMeterRegistry.
